About Navi+

We’re building the modern commerce platform that unifies operations and insights so teams can focus on what matters most: serving customers and growing sustainably.

Our mission

Enable every commerce team to operate with clarity, speed, and confidence through unified systems and real-time intelligence.

What we build

An API-first platform covering OMS, WMS, payments, integrations, and BI — secure, scalable, and extensible.

How we work

Customer-first, data-driven, and outcome-oriented. We partner closely to drive measurable impact.

Leadership

Experienced operators and technologists from commerce and logistics.

A
Alex Nguyen
Chief Executive Officer

Former ops leader at high-growth retailers. Focused on customer value and execution.

B
Ba Tran
Chief Technology Officer

Built scalable platforms in logistics and payments. Passionate about API-first systems.

C
Chris Le
Head of Product

Leads product strategy across OMS, WMS, and analytics with a customer-centric approach.

Our values

Principles that guide how we build and partner.

Customer impact

Deliver measurable outcomes; obsess over customer experience.

Clarity

Make complexity simple; communicate clearly and act decisively.

Ownership

Take responsibility end-to-end; pursue high standards.

Velocity

Ship, learn, and iterate quickly with customer feedback loops.

Join us

We’re hiring curious, collaborative people who care about customer outcomes.

Careers: careers@naviplus.io
